Html: Is it possible to load an audio file and inject it directly into the windows microphone recording stream via NAudio ? IF yes, how? I can't seem to find any decent API documentation for NAudio

I'm afraid this is not possible with NAudio. You would need a virtual device driver that emulates a microphone to do this in windows.

Mark

I don't get it, why are the windows recording channels protected so strongly against writing ?

 

edit: can I somehow select a certain output channel with NAudio ?
